title: Clicking the mouse won't work
body: Lately I've been having an issue where I'll be in game playing normally and then suddenly its like my mouse input partially stops working. I can see the cursor, move it, click and see the green arrows pointing to that spot, but my champ won't move. It only happens when I'm using an Ethernet cable, but I lag on wireless. It's not lag because everything else in game works like its supposed to. It only happens for a few seconds at the time, but its pretty inconvenient. Does anybody know how to fix it, and if so how? Any answer would be great, thanks!

replies.body: At a glance, it sounds like your network might be suffering from packet loss.  To really find out what's going wrong, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of games this is happening in.  The results should also provide some steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Hopefully I got it figured out, guess we'll find out in the next couple of days. Thanks for your help!
